channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump signed an order to end birthright citizenship. What is it and what does that mean?
item.description: President Donald Trump has moved to end a decades-old immigration policy known as birthright citizenship, ordering the cancellation of the constitutio...

item.title: Scores killed as hotel engulfed by flames in Turkish ski resort
item.description: Dozens more have been injured in the blaze, which broke out at the Grand Kartal Hotel.

item.title: A rare blizzard blasts the Deep South, as arctic air brings a hard freeze
item.description: A winter storm prompted a National Weather Service office in Louisiana to issue a first-ever blizzard warning. The storm is causing dangerous conditio...

item.title: Trump's DOGE executive order says Musk's efforts will focus on IT
item.description: Trump on Monday signed an executive order to create Elon Musk's DOGE, with a mandate to improve federal IT systems.

item.title: Trump grants sweeping pardon of Jan. 6 defendants, including rioters who violently attacked police

item.title: Deadly fire at Turkey ski resort hotel
item.description: At least 66 people have died and 32 were injured in a fire at a ski resort hotel in the city of Bolu.

item.title: Ski resort fire in Turkey kills at least 66, injures more than 50
item.description: A fire raged through a popular ski resort south of Istanbul early Tuesday. The deadly fire broke out during a school holiday when the area's hotels ar...

item.title: Jules Feiffer, Pulitzer Prize-winning cartoonist and playwright, dies at 95
item.description: Feiffer was best known for illustrating the children's classic "The Phantom Tollbooth." His loopy lines left a lasting mark on art, literature and fil...

item.title: Lawmakers react to Trump's executive orders
item.description: Lawmakers on Capitol Hill are responding to President Trump's executive orders signed on Day 1 of his second term in the White House. The actions incl...

item.title: Capitol riot leaders Tarrio and Rhodes released from prison
item.description: Two of the most high-profile defendents from the 2021 US Capitol riot were included in Trump's sweeping pardons.

item.title: Dangerous winds return to Southern California as new wildfires break out
Saber teeth in predators evolved many times. Did it lead to their extinction?
item.description: A new analysis suggests saber teeth were highly specialized for puncturing prey, ultimately at the cost of durability.

item.title: 18 states sue Trump administration over birthright citizenship order
item.description: President Trump invoked presidential powers to begin his long-promised immigration crackdown shortly after taking office on Monday.

item.title: 4 ways to lower your credit card debt while unemployed
item.description: Reducing your credit card debt could provide serious relief if you're in between jobs. Here's how to do it.

item.title: Fans rush for hotly anticipated 'romantasy' sequel
item.description: Onyx Storm by Rebecca Yarros is billed as one of the biggest publishing releases since Harry Potter.

item.title: Leaders around the world react as Trump hits the ground running
item.description: The world reacts as President Trump moves to pull the U.S. out of the WHO and the Paris Climate Accords on Day 1 of his second term.

item.title: What executive orders has Trump signed after taking office?
item.description: The Republican quickly set about using his new powers to approve executive actions on a host of policy priorities.
